definitions.definition: A male given name from Ancient Greek of mostly historical use, and a transliteration from modern Greek.

subdefinitions.definition: Pythagoras (c. 570 – c. 495 BC), an Ancient Greek mathematician and philosopher .

main_definition: A male given name from Ancient Greek of mostly historical use, and a transliteration from modern Greek.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , colloquial ) Ellipsis of Pythagoras' theorem .
